Params: {2: 'Liv', 3: 'The energy inside the chamber is... being absorbed by Kamui! His M.I.N.D. is overheating!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "Karen's situation might happen again if this continues! The Tenebrion he's consuming is too powerful—we have to remove the threat before it gets out of hand!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Indeed. Just like Karen's case, we might be able to save Kamui with the same method.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "No, I won't let you go through with that. This risk is far greater than Karenina's condition.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But it's still worth a try... Kamui, he is our companion.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'R-report! The viral density inside Kamui is shrinking rapidly!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm afraid our lives will be much more boring in the future without this guy lightening the mood.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'But most importantly, I dislike farewells just as much as I hate fighting my own companions.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I don't like them as well. I was afraid of Lee's situation just now and... s-so, if the same thing happened again... Bianca, please, wait for a bit more.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "The viral density has nearly dropped to zero! There won't be a corruption risk if we establish a connection now!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I understand. Then let me join you and see this through to the end.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "No, I'll stay on guard duty. I'll pray for your success.", 4: '1'}
